title: Hidden Graffiti Tour
description: Embark on a guided exploration through the city's alleys and hidden streets to discover underground art and graffiti masterpieces. Participants use an app to check in at each piece and learn about the artists and stories behind the works.

title: Mountain Peak Challenge
description: Climb to the summit of Mount Chiliad peaks scattered. Participants must check in at the base camp of the mountain to start the timer. The fastest cumulative time wins. Progress and current leaders are updated in real-time on the web map.

title: Ghost Town Adventure
description: Venture into a nearby abandoned town rumored to be haunted. Equipped with just a flashlight, participants must uncover the mysteries of the town, collecting items and solving puzzles to reveal its history. The first to solve the town's secret wins.

title: Urban Safari Expedition
description: Explore the hidden natural wonders within the city's limits. This event takes participants through abandoned parks, rooftop gardens, and forgotten alleyways that have been reclaimed by nature. Capture unique wildlife photos to earn points, with bonus points for rare finds.

title: Night Skyline Challenge
description: Experience the city from new heights by navigating to the top of various skyscrapers and high-rise buildings. Each location provides a puzzle or challenge to solve before you can proceed to the next. The first to complete the circuit and snap a selfie with the city's skyline at night from the final location wins.

title: Ancient Artifacts Quest
description: Discover the secrets of the past by finding ancient artifacts hidden throughout the city. Clues to their locations are encrypted in old manuscripts scattered in libraries and old houses. Decrypting these clues and finding the artifacts add them to your collection. The first to complete their collection wins the grand prize.

title: City Legends Quest
description: Dive into the urban legends of the city by following a series of cryptic clues leading to locations tied to ghost stories, historical mysteries, and unsolved riddles. Each site offers a piece of the puzzle to uncover a hidden urban legend. The first to solve the city's greatest mystery wins.

title: Tech Tycoon's Trail
description: Follow the legacy of a fictitious tech mogul who has hidden parts of a prototype device around the city. Clues are embedded in digital geocaches, requiring participants to use their tech-savvy skills to find and assemble the prototype. The first to build the device and activate it wins.

title: Time Capsule Chase
description: Participants race against time to find time capsules hidden around the city by a philanthropic historian. Clues are based on historical events, landmarks, and figures. The first to find and unlock the final time capsule win the prize.

title: Summit of the Groups
description: Leaders and representatives of various groups of the city meet at a neutral place to discuss alliances, trade agreements, and joint events. Decisions made here can influence the city politics and economy. The meeting's progress and outcomes are shared in a live stream, allowing everyone to see the shifting alliances.

title: Adventure Club Conclave
description: Adventurers, explorers, and thrill-seekers gather to share tales of their exploits, plan expeditions, and attend workshops on survival skills, navigation, and adventure photography. The event concludes with an award for the most daring adventure story shared.

title: Rooftop Runner's Rally
description: Participants race across the city's rooftops, parkour style, navigating from checkpoint to checkpoint. Obstacles and challenges increase in difficulty as racers progress, with the fastest and most agile participant claiming victory and winning the prize.

title: Urban Dream
description: Pedal through the city's heart, taking on a course that includes busy streets, tight alleys, and a few shortcuts for those daring enough to find them. The race's real-time positions are displayed on the web map, allowing for dynamic spectating and on-the-fly strategy changes.

title: Desert Rally Raid
description: Riders face the heat and treacherous terrain of the desert in a grueling point-to-point race. Natural obstacles and occasional sandstorms add to the challenge. The race's progress is tracked in real time, showing each racer's position and the distance to the finish line.

title: Skybound Slalom
description: Pilots navigate through a series of airborne gates scattered among the clouds, requiring precision flying and quick reflexes. The course spans across different terrains, offering stunning views from above.

title: Night City Circuit
description: Compete in a high-speed race that takes place at night, illuminating the city with the roar of engines and the glow of streetlights. The circuit includes sharp turns, long straights, and a few surprise shortcuts.

title: Urban Rally Raid
description: A long race that takes participants through a variety of city landscapes, from bustling downtown streets to the neglected outskirts. Racers must navigate checkpoints spread across the city, dealing with unpredictable traffic, improvised routes, and dynamic weather conditions, testing their endurance and adaptability to the max.

title: Night Flight Spectacle
description: An after-dark parachute event where participants jump with LED-lit suits. The city below is a canvas of lights, and the skydivers add to the spectacle with their illuminated descent. The challenge includes navigating through laser gates suspended between buildings, adding an extra layer of thrill to the night sky.

title: Skyline Leap
description: Participants take off from a helicopter for a breathtaking parachute jump, aiming for landing zones on top of iconic skyscrapers. Precision is key as each building offers a unique challenge and points are awarded for accuracy, style, and the complexity of the route chosen during the descent.

title: Neon Nights
description: A renowned DJ visits the city's hottest club, promising an unforgettable night of music and dancing. You can join the event in the club. The more players join, the more renowned the club becomes, unlocking exclusive in-game perks.

title: Sunset Soiree
description: Host a luxurious party on a yacht cruising along the coast at sunset. Players can join by docking their boats nearby or flying in. The web map shows the yachts participating in the event, their routes, and the concentration of players, making it a social hotspot in the game world.

title: Sundown Symphony
description: A party that transitions into a musical evening with live performances. The standout performer or DJ is given the opportunity to organize and headline the music lineup for the next event, setting the vibe and tempo for another unforgettable night.

title: Midnight Luau
description: A tropical-themed beach party under the stars, featuring live music, dance performances, and a firework display over the ocean. Attendees participate in traditional luau activities, with prizes for the best-dressed and limbo champions.

title: Surf's Up Soiree
description: A day-to-night beach event centered around surfing competitions and a DJ spinning summer hits. The evening caps off with a bonfire and storytelling session about legendary surfers and epic waves.

title: Full Moon Fiesta
description: A beach party held on the night of a full moon, featuring live drum circles, fire dancers, and a midnight swim ritual. Attendees create lanterns to release into the sea, with prizes for creativity and sustainability.

title: High Roller Heist
description: A casino-themed event where participants engage in various games to accumulate chips, with the ultimate goal of 'cracking the vault' in a high-stakes finale game. The winner takes home an exclusive VIP casino experience package and the prize.

title: Poker Prodigy Tournament
description: A city-wide poker tournament that brings together amateur and seasoned players. The event progresses through various venues, culminating in a grand finale at the city's most prestigious casino. The champion earns a trophy and the prize.

title: Fantasy Betting Bazaar
description: Enter a fantasy-themed casino where mythical creatures and lore inspire the games. Participants bet with fantasy coins on races and duels between animated creatures, with the most successful bettors entering a magical-themed escape room challenge.

title: Masquerade Poker Night
description: A glamorous evening of casino games where players wear elaborate masks and costumes. The night features a mix of classic games and unique variations, with a grand masquerade ball as the finale.

title: Industrial Zone Showdown
description: Teams compete in an abandoned industrial complex, using the machinery and structures for cover and strategic advantage. The event emphasizes teamwork and strategy, with the winning team earning a private party at the city's top entertainment venue and the prize.

title: Historic District Duel
description: A paintball battle set in a cordoned-off area of the city's historic district, where players navigate through narrow streets and buildings. The mix of history and adrenaline offers a unique experience, with the victorious team receiving the grand prize.

title: Urban Warfare
description: Teams compete in a deserted part of the city, transformed into a paintball battleground. The objective is to capture the opposing team's flag and return it to your base. Real-time updates of each team's score and territory control are shown on the web map, adding a strategic layer to the chaos.
